abilities.name: Mitosis
abilities.description: Your space docks cannot produce infantry. At the start of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

faction_techs.name: Bioplasmosis (GG)
faction_techs.description: At the end of the status phase, you may remove any number of infantry from planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems.

faction_techs.name: Letani Warrior I
faction_techs.description: Cost 1(x2), Combat 8. PRODUCTION 1.

faction_techs.name: Letani Warrior II (GG)
faction_techs.description: Cost 1(x2), Combat 7. PRODUCTION 2. After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 6 or greater, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

agents.name: Letani Ospha
agents.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose a player's non-fighter ship; that player may replace that ship with one from their reinforcements that costs up to 2 more than the replaced ship.

commanders.name: Dirzuga Rophal
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 12 ground forces on planets you control; After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units that have PRODUCTION: You may produce 1 unit in that system.

heroes.name: Letani Miasmala
heroes.description: ULTRASONIC EMITTER, ACTION: Produce any number of units in any number of systems that contain 1 or more of your ground forces. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Stymie Ω
promissory.description: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your units: You may place 1 command token from that player's reinforcements in any non-home system. Then, return this card to the Arborec player.

flagship.name: Duha Menaimon
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7(x2), Move 1, Capacity 5. Sustain Damage. After you activate this system, you may produce up to 5 units in this system

mech.name: Letani Behemoth
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. Sustain Damage, PRODUCTION 2, Plantary Shield. DEPLOY: When you would use your MITOSIS faction ability you may replace 1 of your infantry with 1 mech from your reinforcements instead.

starting_fleet.name: Arborec Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Zeal
abilities.description: You always vote first during the agenda phase. When you cast at least 1 vote, cast 1 additional vote for each player in the game including you.

abilities.name: Raid Formation
abilities.description: When 1 or more of your units uses ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, for each hit produced in excess of your opponent's Fighters, choose 1 of your opponent's ships that has SUSTAIN DAMAGE to become damaged.

faction_techs.name: Aerie Hololattice (Y)
faction_techs.description: Other players cannot move ships through systems that contain 1 or more of your structures. Each planet that contains 1 or more of your structures gains the PRODUCTION 1 ability as if it were a unit.

faction_techs.name: Strike Wing Alpha I
faction_techs.description: Cost 1, Combat 8, Move 2, Capacity 1. Anti-Fighter Barrage 9(x2)

faction_techs.name: Strike Wing Alpha II (RR)
faction_techs.description: Cost 1, Combat 7, Move 2, Capacity 1. Anti-Fighter Barrage 6(x3). When this unit uses ANTI-FUGHTER BARRAGE, each result of 9 or 10 also destroys 1 of your opponent's infantry in the space area of the active system

agents.name: Trillossa Aun Mirik
agents.description: When a player produces ground forces in a system: You may exhaust this card; that player may place those units on any planets they control in that system and any adjacent systems.

commanders.name: Trrakan Aun Zulok
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 6 units that have ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, SPACE CANNON, or BOMBARDMENT on the game board; When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability: you may choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die.

heroes.name: Mirik Aun Sissiri
heroes.description: HELIX PROTOCOL. ACTION: Move any number of your ships from any systems to any number of other systems that contain 1 of oyur command tokens and no other player's ships. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Strike Wing Ambuscade
promissory.description: When one or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability: Choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die. Then, return this card to the Argent player.

flagship.name: Quetzecoatl
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. Sustain Damage. Other players cannot use space cannon against your ships in this system

mech.name: Aerie Sentinel
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. Sustain Damage. This unit does not count against capacity if it is being transported or if it is in a space area with 1 or more of yor ships that have capacity values

starting_techs.name: Argent Starting Tech
starting_techs.description: Choose two of the following: Neural Motivator, Sarween Tools, Plasma Scoring

starting_fleet.name: Argent Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 2 Destroyers, 2 Fighters, 5 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Munitions Reserves
abilities.description: At the start of each round of space combat, you may spend 2 trade goods; you may re-roll any number of your dice during that combat round.

abilities.name: Armada
abilities.description: The maximum number of non-fighter ships you can have in each system is equal to 2 more than the number of tokens in your fleet pool.

faction_techs.name: L4 Disruptors (Y)
faction_techs.description: During an invasion, units cannot use SPACE CANNON against your units.

faction_techs.name: Non-Euclidean Shielding (RR)
faction_techs.description: When 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, cancel 2 hits instead of 1.

agents.name: Viscount Unlenn
agents.description: At the start of a space combat round: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ship in the active system. That ship rolls 1 additional die during this combat round.

commanders.name: Rear Admiral Farran
commanders.description: After 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE: You may gain 1 trade good.

heroes.name: Darktalon Treilla
heroes.description: DARK MATTER AFFINITY. ACTION: Place this card near the game board; the number of non-fighter ships you can have in systems is not limited by laws or by the number of command tokens in you fleet pool during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

promissory.name: War Funding Ω
promissory.description: After you and your opponent roll dice during space combat: You may reroll all of your opponent's dice. You may reroll any number of your dice. Then, return this card to the Letnev player.

flagship.name: Arc Secundus
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 5(x3). Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD. At the start of each space combat round, repair this ship.

mech.name: Dunlain Reaper
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. DEPLOY: At the start of a round of ground combat, you may spend 2 resources to replace 1 of your infantry in that combat with 1 mech.

starting_fleet.name: Barony Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 1 Carrier, 1 Destroyer, 1 Fighter, 3 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Scavenge
abilities.description: After you gain control of a planet, gain 1 trade good.

abilities.name: Nomadic
abilities.description: You can score objectives even if you do not control the planets in your home system.

faction_techs.name: Chaos Mapping (B)
faction_techs.description: Other players cannot activate asteroid fields that contain 1 or more of your ships. At the start of your turn during the action phasem you may produce 1 unit in a system that contains at least 1 of your units that has production.

faction_techs.name: Floating Factory I
faction_techs.description: Move 1, Capacity 4. PRODUCTION 5. This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet. This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship. If this unit is blockaded, It is destroyed.

faction_techs.name: Floating Factory II
faction_techs.description: Move 2, Capacity 5. PRODUCTION 7. This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet. This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship. If this unit is blockaded, It is destroyed.

agents.name: Captain Mendosa
agents.description: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to increase the move value of 1 of that player's ships to match the move value of the ship on the game board that has the highest move value.

commanders.name: Rowl Sarrig
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 3 space docks on the game board. When you produce fighters or infantry: You may place each of those units at any of your space docks that are not blockaded.

heroes.name: Gurno Aggero
heroes.description: ARMAGEDDON RELAY. ACTION: Choose 1 system that is adjacent to 1 of your space docks. Destroy all other player's infantry and fighters in that system. The, purge this card.

promissory.name: Ragh's Call
promissory.description: After you commit 1 or more units to land on a planet: Remove all of the Saar player's ground forces from that planet and place them on a planet controlled by the Saar player. The return this card to the Saar player.

flagship.name: Son of Ragh
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 6(x4).

mech.name: Scavenger Zeta
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. DEPLOY: After you gain control of a planet, you may spend 1 trade good to place 1 mech on that planet.

starting_fleet.name: Saar Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: The Tribunii Ω
abilities.description: During setup, choose a Keleres hero that corresponds to an unsued faction; take that faction's home system, command tokens, and control markers. The unchosen Keleres heroes are not used.

abilities.name: Council Patronage
abilities.description: Replenish your commodities at the start of the strategy phase, then gain 1 trade good.

abilities.name: Law's Order Ω
abilities.description: You may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity at the start of any player's turn to treat all laws as blank until the end of your turn.

faction_techs.name: I.I.H.Q. Modernization (Y)
faction_techs.description: You are neighbors with all players that have units in or adjacent to the Mecatol Rex system. Gain the Custodia Vigilia planet card and its legendary planet ability card. You cannot lose these cards, and this card cannot have an X or Y assimilator token placed on it.

faction_techs.name: Agency Supply Network (YY)
faction_techs.description: Whenever you resolve one of your PRODUCTION abilities, you may resolve an additional one of your PRODUCTION abilities in any system; the additional use does not trigger this ability.

agents.name: Xander Alexin Victori III
agents.description: At any time: You may exhaust this card to allow any play to spend commodities as if they were trade goods

commanders.name: Suffi An
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Spend 1 trade good after you play an action card that has a component action. After you perform a component action: You may perform an additional action.

heroes.name: Kuuasi Aun Jalatai
heroes.description: OVERWING ZETA. At the start of space combat in a system that contains a planet you control: Place your flagship and up to a total of 2 cruisers and/or destroyers from your reinforcements in the active system. Then, purge this card.

heroes.name: Odlynn Myrr
heroes.description: OPERATION ARCHON. After an agenda is revealed: You may cast up to 6 additional votes on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome for this agenda. For each player that votes for another outcome, gain 1 trade good and 1 command token. Then, Purge this card.

heroes.name: Harka Leeds
heroes.description: ERWAN'S COVENANT. ACTION: Reveal cards from the action card deck until you reveal 3 action cards that have component actions. Draw those cards and shuffle the rest back into the action card deck. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Keleres Rider
promissory.description: After an agenda is revealed: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud the outcome of this agenda. If your prediciton is correct, draw 1 action card and gain 2 trade goods. Then, return this card to the Keleres player.

flagship.name: Artemiris
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7(x2), Move 1, Capacity 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. Other players must spend 2 influence to activate this system.

mech.name: Omniopiares
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. Other players must spend 1 influence to commit ground forces to the planet that contains this unit.

starting_techs.name: Keleres Starting Tech
starting_techs.description: Choose 2 non-faction technologies owned by other players.

starting_fleet.name: Keleres Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 2 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Star Forge
abilities.description: ACTION: Spend 1 token form your strategy pool to place either 2 fighter or 1 destroyer from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your war suns.

abilities.name: Gashlai Physiology
abilities.description: Your ships can move through supernovas

faction_techs.name: Magmus Reactor Ω (RR)
faction_techs.description: Your ships can move into supernovas. Each supernova that contains 1 or more of your units gains the PRODUCTION 5 ability as if it were 1 of your units.

faction_techs.name: Prototype War Sun I
faction_techs.description: Cost 12, Combat 3(x3), Move 1, Capacity 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3(x3). Other players' units in this system lose planetary shield.

faction_techs.name: Prototype War Sun II (RRRY)
faction_techs.description: Cost 10, Combat 3(x3), Move 3, Capacity 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3(x3). Other players' units in this system lose planetary shield.

agents.name: Umbat
agents.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to chose a player; that player may produce up to 2 units that each have a cost of 4 or less in a system that contains one of their war suns or their flagship.

commanders.name: Magmus
commanders.description: After you spend a token from your strategy pool: You may gain 1 trade good.

heroes.name: Adjudicator Ba'al
heroes.description: NOVA SEED. After you move a war sun into a non-home system other than Mecatol Rex: You may destroy all other players' unit sin that system and replace that system tile with the Muaat supernova tile. If you do, purge this card and each planet card that corresponds to the replaced system tile.

promissory.name: Fires of the Gashlai
promissory.description: ACTION: Remove 1 token from the Muaat player's fleet pool and return it to their reinforcements. Then, gain your war sun unit upgrade technology card. Then, return this card to the Muaat player.

flagship.name: The Inferno
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 1 cruiser in this unit's system.

mech.name: Ember Colossus
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. When you use your STAR FORGE ability in this system or an adjacent system, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements with this unit.

starting_fleet.name: Muaat Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 War Sun, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Guild Ships
abilities.description: You may negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbors.

abilities.name: Arbiters
abilities.description: When you are negotiating a transaction, action cards can be exchanged as part of a transacation.

abilities.name: Masters of Trade
abilities.description: You do not have to spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the 'Trade' strategy card

faction_techs.name: Quantum Datahub Node (YYY)
faction_techs.description: At the end of the strategy phase, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool and give another player 3 of your trade goods. If you do, give 1 of your strategy cards to that player and take 1 of their strategy cards.

faction_techs.name: Production Biomes (GG)
faction_techs.description: ACTON: Exhaust this card and spend 1 strategy token from your strategy pool to gain 4 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 2 trade goods.

agents.name: Carth of Golden Sands
agents.description: During the action phase: You may exhaust tis card to gain 2 commodities or replenish another player's commodities.

commanders.name: Gila the Silvertongue
commanders.description: Unlock: Have 10 Trade Goods; When you cast votes: You may spend any number of trade goods; cast 2 additional votes for each trade good spent.

heroes.name: Harrugh Gafhara
heroes.description: GALACTIC SECURITIES NET When one or more of your units use PRODUCTION: You may reduce the cost of each of your units to 0 during this use of PRODUCTION. If you do, purge this card.

promissory.name: Trade Convoys
promissory.description: ACTION: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you may negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor. If you activate a systemthat contains one or more of the Hacan player's units, return this card ot the Hacan player.

flagship.name: Wrath of Kenara
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7 (x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. Sustain Damage. After you roll a die during a space combat in this system, you may spend 1 trade good to apply +1 to the result.

mech.name: Pride of Kenara
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. Sustain Damage. This planet's card may be traded as part of a transaction; if you do, move all of your units from this planet to another planet you control.

starting_fleet.name: Hacan Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Voidborn
abilities.description: Nebulae do not affect your ships' movement.

abilities.name: Aetherpassage
abilities.description: After a player activates a system, you may allow that player to move their ships through systems that contain your ships.

abilities.name: Dark Whispers
abilities.description: During setup, take the 'Dark Pact' faction promissory note; you have 2 faction promissory notes.

faction_techs.name: Aetherstream (BB)
faction_techs.description: After you or one of your neighbors activates a system that is adjacent to an anomoly, you may apply +1 to the move value of all of that player's ships during this tactical action.

faction_techs.name: Voidwatch (G)
faction_techs.description: After a player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your units, they must give you 1 promissory note from their hand, if able.

agents.name: Acamar
agents.description: After a player moves ships into a system that does not contain any planets: You may exhaust this card to gain 1 command token.

commanders.name: Xuange
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Be neighbors with all other players. After another player activates a system that contains 1 of your command tokens: You may return that token to your reinforcements.

heroes.name: Conservator Procyon
heroes.description: MULTIVERSE SHIFT. ACTION: Place 1 frontier token in each system that does not contain any planets and doe snot already have a frontier token. Then, explore each frontier token that is in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Dark Pact
promissory.description: ACTION: Place this card face up i your play area. When you give a number of commodities to the Empyrean player equal to your maximum commodity value, you each gain 1 trade good. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card ot the Empyrean player.

promissory.name: Blood Pact
promissory.description: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. When you and the Empyrean player cast votes for the same outcome, cast 4 additional votes for that outcome. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.

flagship.name: Dynamo
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. After any player's unit in this system or an adjacent system uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, you may spend 2 influence to repair that unit.

mech.name: Watcher
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. You may remove this unit from a system that contains or is adjacent to another player's units to cancel an action card played by that player.

starting_fleet.name: Empyrean Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Destroyer, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Orbital Drop
abilities.description: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on 1 planet you control.

abilities.name: Versatile
abilities.description: When you gain command tokens during the status phase, gain 1 additional command token.

faction_techs.name: Spec Ops I
faction_techs.description: Cost 1(x2), Combat 7.

faction_techs.name: Spec Ops II (GG)
faction_techs.description: Cost 1(x2), Combat 6. After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 5 or greater, place this unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

faction_techs.name: Advanced Carrier I
faction_techs.description: Cost 3, Combat 9, Move 1, Capacity 6.

faction_techs.name: Advanced Carrier II (BB)
faction_techs.description: Cost 3, Combat 9, Move 2, Capacity 8. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

agents.name: Evelyn Delouis
agents.description: At the start of a ground combat: You may exhaust this card to chose 1 ground force in the active system; that ground force rolls 1 additional die during that combat round.

commanders.name: Claire Gibson
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Control planets that have a combined total of at least 12 resources. At the start of a ground combat on a planet you control: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.

heroes.name: Jace X. 4th Air Legion
heroes.description: HELIO COMMAND ARRAY. ACTION: Remove each of your command tokens from the game board and return them to your reinforcements. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Military Support
promissory.description: At the start of the Sol player's turn: Remove 1 token from the Sol player's strategy pool, if able, and return it to their reinforcements. Then, you may place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you conrol. Then, return this card to the Sol player.

flagship.name: Genesis
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 1, Capacity 12. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. At the end of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements in this system's space area.

mech.name: ZS Thunderbolt M2
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. DEPLOY: After you use your ORBITAL DROP faction ability, you may spend 3 resources to place 1 mech on that planet.

starting_fleet.name: Sol Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Destroyer, 3 Fighters, 5 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Quantum Entanglement
abilities.description: You may treat all systems that contain an alpha or beta wormhole as adjacent to each other. Game effects cannot prevent you form using this ability.

abilities.name: Slipstream
abilities.description: During your tactical actions, apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships that starts its movement in you home system or in a system that contains either an alpha or beta wormole.

abilities.name: Creuss Gate
abilities.description: When you create the game board, place the Creuss Gate tile (tile 17) where your home system would normally be placed. The Creuss Gate system is not a home system. Then, place your home system (tile 51) in your play area.

faction_techs.name: Wormhole Generator Ω (BB)
faction_techs.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to place or move a Creuss womrhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships.

faction_techs.name: Dimensional Splicer (R)
faction_techs.description: At the start of a space combat in a system that contains a womrhoel and 1 or more of your ships, you may produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships.

agents.name: Emissary Taivra
agents.description: After a player activates a system that contains a non-delta wormhole: You may exhaust ths card; if you do, that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain a wormhole during this tactical action.

commanders.name: Sai Seravus
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have units in 3 systems that contain alpha or beta wormholes. After your ships move: For each ship that has a capacity value and moved through 1 or more wormholes, you may place 1 fighter from your reinforcements with that ship if you have unused capacity in the active system.

heroes.name: Riftwalker Meian
heroes.description: SINGULARITY REACTOR. ACTION: Swap the positions of any 2 systems that contian wormholes or your units, other than the Creuss system and the Wormhole Nexus. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Creuss Iff
promissory.description: At the start of your turn during the action phase: Place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet oyu control or a non-home system that doe snot contain another player's ships. Then, return this card to the Creuss player.

flagship.name: Hil Colish
flagship.description: Cost 8, Comabt 5, Move 1, Cpaacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. This ship's system contains a delta wormhole. During movement, this ship may move before or after your other ships.

mech.name: Icarus Drive
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. After any player activates a system, you may remove this unit from the game board to place or move a Creuss wormhole token into this system.

starting_fleet.name: Ghosts Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 2 Destroyers, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Assimilate
abilities.description: When you gain control of a planet, replace each PDS and space dock that is on that planet with a matching unit from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Harrow
abilities.description: At the end of each round of ground combat, your ships in the active system may use their Bombardment abilities against your opponent's ground forces on the planet.

faction_techs.name: Inheritance Systems (YY)
faction_techs.description: You may exhaust this card and spend 2 resources when you research of technology; ignore all of that technology's prerequisites.

faction_techs.name: Super-Dreadnought I
faction_techs.description: Cost 4, Combat 5, Move 1, Capacity 2. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 5.

faction_techs.name: Super-Dreadnought II (BBY)
faction_techs.description: Cost 4, Combat 4, Move 2, Capacity 2. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 4. This unit cannot be destroyed by 'Direct Hit' action cards.

agents.name: I48S
agents.description: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to replace 1 of their infantry in the active system with 1 mech from their reinforcements.

commanders.name: 2RAM
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 4 dreadnoughts on the board. Units that have PLANETARY SHIELD do not prevent you from using Bombardment.

heroes.name: The Helmsman
heroes.description: DARK SPACE NAVIGATION. ACTION: Choose 1 system that does not contain otehr players' ships: you may move your flagship and any number of your dreadnoughts from other systems into the chosen system. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Cybernetic Enhancements Ω
promissory.description: When you gain command tokens during the status phase: Gain 1 additional command token. Then, return this card to the L1Z1X player.

flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 1, Capacity 5. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. During a space combat, hits produced by this ship and by your dreadnoughts in this system must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

mech.name: Annihilator
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 8. While not participating in ground combat, this unit can use its BOMBARDMENT ability on planets in its system as if it were a ship.

starting_fleet.name: L1Z1X Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 1 Carrier, 3 Fighters, 5 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Edict
abilities.description: When you win a combat, place 1 command token from your opponent's reinforcements in your fleet pool if it does not already contain 1 of that player's tokens; other player's tokens in your fleet pool increase your fleet limit but cannot be redistributed.

abilities.name: Imperia
abilities.description: When you win a combat, place 1 command token from your opponent's reinforcements on your faction sheet if it does not already contain 1 of their command tokens; While another player's command token is on your faction sheet, you can use the ability of that player's commander, if it is unlocked.

abilities.name: Hubris
abilities.description: During setup, purge your 'Alliance' promissory note. Other players cannot give you their 'Alliance' promissory note.

faction_techs.name: Genetic Recombination (G)
faction_techs.description: You may exhaust this card before a player casts votes; that player must cast at least 1 vote for an outcome of your choice or remove 1 token from their fleet pool and return it to their reinforcements.

faction_techs.name: Crimson Legionnaire I
faction_techs.description: Cost 1(x2), Combat 8. After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.

faction_techs.name: Crimson Legionnaire II
faction_techs.description: Cost 1(x2), Combat 7. After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good. Then, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

agents.name: Jae Mir Kan
agents.description: When you would spend a command token during the secondary ability of a strategic action: You may exhaust this card to remove 1 of the active player's command tokens from the board and use it instead.

commanders.name: Il Na Viroset
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 2 other factions' command tokens in your fleet pool. During your tactical actions, you can activate systems that contain your command tokens. If you do, return both command tokens to your reinforcements and end your turn.

heroes.name: Airo Shir Aur
heroes.description: BENEDICTION. ACTION: Move all units in the space area of any system to an adjacent system that contains a different player's ships. Space combat is resolved in that system; neither player can retreat or resolve abilities that would move their ships. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Scepter of Dominion
promissory.description: Ar the start of the strategy phase: Choose 1 nonhome system that contains your unitss; each other player who has a token on the Mahact player's command sheet places a token from their reinforcements in that system. The, return this card to the Mahact player.

flagship.name: Arvicon Rex
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. During combat against an opponent whose command token is not in your fleet pool, apply +2 to the results of this units combat rolls.

mech.name: Starlancer
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. After a player whose command token is in your fleet pool activates this system, you may spend their tokenfrom your fleet pool to end their turn; they gain that token.

starting_fleet.name: Mahact Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 1 Carrier, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 3 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: At the sart of a space combat, you may roll 1 die each of up to 2 of your cruisers or destroyers in the system. For each result equal to or greater than that ship's combat value, produce 1 hit; your opponent must assign i to 1 of their ships.

abilities.name: Pillage
abilities.description: After 1 of your neighbors gains trade goods or resolves a transaction, if they have 3 or more trade goods, youmay take 1 of their trade goods or commodities.

faction_techs.name: Salvage Operations (YY)
faction_techs.description: After you win or lose a space combat, gain 1 trade good; if you won the combat, you may also produce 1 ship in that system of any ship type that was destroyed during the combat

faction_techs.name: Mirror Computing (YYY)
faction_techs.description: When you spend trade goods, each trade good is worth 2 resources or influence instead of 1

agents.name: Suffi An
agents.description: After the PILLAGE faction ability is used against another player: You may exhaust this card; if you do, you and that player each draw 1 action card.

commanders.name: S'Ula Mentarion
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 4 cruisers on the game board. After you win a space combat: You may force your opponent to give you 1 promissory note from their hand.

heroes.name: Ipswitch, Loose Cannon
heroes.description: SLEEPER CELL. At the start of space combat that you are participating in: You may purge this card; if you do, for each other player's ship that is destroyed during this combat, place 1 ship of that type from your reinforcements in the active system.

promissory.name: Promise of Protection
promissory.description: ACTION: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Mentak player cannot use their Pillage faction ability against you. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Mentak player's units, return this card to the Mentak player.

flagship.name: Fourth Moon
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DMAAGE. Other players' ships in this system cannot use sustain damage.

mech.name: Moll Terminus
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. Other players' ground forces on this planet cannot use SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

starting_fleet.name: Mentak Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 2 Cruisers, 3 Fighter, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Telepathic
abilities.description: At the end of the strategy phase, place the Naalu '0' token on your strategy card; you are first in initiative order.

abilities.name: Foresight
abilities.description: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may place 1 token from your strategy pool in an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships; move your ships from the active system into that system.

faction_techs.name: Neuroglaive (GGG)
faction_techs.description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of oyur ships, that player removes 1 token from their fleet pool and returns it to their reinforcements.

faction_techs.name: Hybrid Crystal Fighter I
faction_techs.description: Cost 1(x2), Combat 8

faction_techs.name: Hybrid Crystal Fighter II (GB)
faction_techs.description: Cost 1(x2), Combat 7, Move 2. This unit may move without being transported. Each fighter in excess of your ships' capacity counts as 1/2 of a ship against your fleet pool.

agents.name: Z'eu Ω
agents.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card and shoose a player; That player may perform a tactical action in a non-home system without placing a command token; that system still counts as being activated.

commanders.name: M'aban Ω
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have ground forces in or adjacent to the Mecatol Rex system. At any time: You may look at your neighbors' hand of promissory notes and the top and bottom card of the agenda deck.

heroes.name: The Oracle
heroes.description: C-RADIUM GEOMETRY. At the end of the status phase: You may force each other player to give you 1 promissory note from their hand. If you do, purge this card.

promissory.name: Gift of Prescience
promissory.description: At the end of the strategy phase: Place this card face-up in your play area and place the Naalu '0' token on your strategy card; you are first in the initiative order. The Naalu player cannot use their TELEPATHIC faction ability during this game round. Return this card to the Naalu player at the end of the status phase.

flagship.name: Matriarch
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 9(x2), Move 1, Capacity 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. During an invasion in this system, you may commit fighters to planets as if they were ground forces. When combat ends, return those units to the space area.

mech.name: Iconoclast Ω
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. Other players cannot use ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE against your units in this system.

starting_fleet.name: Naalu Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 1 Cruiser, 1 Destroyer, 3 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Distant Suns
abilities.description: When you explore a planet that contains 1 of your mechs, you may draw 1 additional card; choose 1 to resolve and discard the rest.

abilities.name: Fabrication
abilities.description: ACTION: Either purge 2 of your relic fragments of the same type to gain 1 relic; or purge 1 of your relic fragments to gain 1 command token.

faction_techs.name: Supercharge (R)
faction_techs.description: At the start of a combat round, you may exhaust this card to apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat round.

faction_techs.name: Pre-Fab Arcologies (GGG)
faction_techs.description: After you explore a planet, ready that planet.

agents.name: Garv and Gunn
agents.description: At the end of a player's turn: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to explore 1 of their planets.

commanders.name: Dart and Tai
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 3 mechs in 3 systems. After you gain control of a planet that was controlled by another player: You may explore that planet.

heroes.name: Hesh and Prit
heroes.description: PERFECT SYNTHESIS. ACTION: Gain 1 relic and perform the secondary ability of up to 2 readied or unchosen strategy cards; during this action, spend command tokens from your reinforcements instead of your strategy pool. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Black Market Forgery
promissory.description: ACTION: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of the same type to gain 1 relic. Then, return this card to the Naaz-Rokha player.

flagship.name: Visz el Vir
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 9(x2), Move 1, Capacity 4. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. Your mechs in this system roll 1 additional die during combat.

mech.name: Eidolon | Z-Grav Eidolon
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6(x2). SUSTAIN DAMAGE. If this unit is in the space area of the active system at the start of a space combat, flip this card. (This card begins the game with this side face up) | Cost 2, Combat 8(x2). If this unit is in the space area of the active system, it is also a ship. At the end of a space battle in the active system, flip this card. (This card begins the game with this side face down)

starting_fleet.name: Naaz-Rokha Alliance Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Destroyer, 2 Fighters, 1 Mech, 3 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Galactic Threat
abilities.description: You cannot vote on agendas. Once per agenda phase, after an agenda is revealed, you may predict aloud the outcome of that agenda. If your prediction is correct, gain 1 technology that is owned by a player who voted how you predicted.

abilities.name: Technological Singularity
abilities.description: Once per combat, after 1 of your opponet's units is destroyed, you may gain 1 technology that is owned by that player.

abilities.name: Propagation
abilities.description: You cannot research technology. When you would research a technology, gain 3 command tokens instead.

faction_techs.name: Valefar Assimilator X
faction_techs.description: When you would gain another player's technology using one of your faction abilities, you may place the 'X' assimilator token on a faction technology owned by that player instead. While this token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text. You cannot place an assimilator token on technology that already has an assimilator token.

faction_techs.name: Valefar Assimilator Y
faction_techs.description: When you would gain another player's technology using one of your faction abilities, you may place the 'Y' assimilator token on a faction technology owned by that player instead. While this token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text. You cannot place an assimilator token on technology that already has an assimilator token.

agents.name: Nekro Malleon
agents.description: During the action phase: You may exhaust this card to choose a player; that player may discard 1 action card or spend 1 command token from their command sheet to gain 2 trade goods.

commanders.name: Nekro Acidos
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Own 3 technologies. A 'Valefar Assimilator' technology counts only if its X or Y token is on a technology. After you gain a technology: you may draw 1 action card.

heroes.name: UNIT.DSGN.FLAYESH
heroes.description: POLYMORPHIC ALGORITHM. ACTION: Choose a planet that has a technology specialty in a system that contains your units. Destroy any other player's unit's on that planet. Gain trade goods equal to that planet's combined resource and influence values and gain 1 technology that matches the specialty of that planet. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Antivirus
promissory.description: At the start of a combat: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Nekro player cannot use their TECHNOLOGICAL SINGULARITY faction ability against you. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Nekro player's units, return this card to the Nekro player.

flagship.name: The Alastor
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 9(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. At the start of a space combat, choose any number of your ground forces in this system to participate in combat as if they were ships.

mech.name: Mordred
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. During a combat against an opponent who has an 'X' or 'Y' token on 1 or more of their technologies, apply +2 to the result of each of this unit's combat rolls.

starting_fleet.name: Nekro Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 1 Carrier, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 2 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: The Company
abilities.description: During setup, take the 2 additional Nomad faction agents and place them next to your faction sheet; you have 3 agents.

abilities.name: Future Sight
abilities.description: During the Agenda phase, after an outcome that you voted for or predicted is resolved, gain 1 trade good.

faction_techs.name: Temporal Command Suite (Y)
faction_techs.description: After any player's agent becomes exhausted, you may exhaust this card to ready that agent; if your ready another player's agent, you may perform a transaction with that player.

agents.name: Artuno the Betrayer
agents.description: When you gain trade goods from the supply: You may exhaust this card to place an equal number of trade goods on this card. When this card readies, gain the trade goods on this card.

agents.name: Field Marshal Mercer
agents.description: At the end of a player's turn: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove up to 2 of their ground forces form the game board and place them on planets they control in the active system.

agents.name: The Thundarian
agents.description: After the 'Roll Dice' step of combat: You may exhaust this card. If you do, hits are not assigned to either players' units. Return to the start of this combat round's 'Roll Dice' step.

commanders.name: Navarch Feng
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 1 scored secret objective. You can produce your flagship without spending resources.

heroes.name: Ahk-Syl Siven
heroes.description: PROBABILITY MATRIX. ACTION: Place this card near the game board; your flagship and units it transports can move out of systems that contain your command tokens during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

promissory.name: The Cavalry
promissory.description: At the start of a space combat against a player other than the Nomad: During this combat, treat 1 of your non-fighter ships as if it has the SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability, combat value, and ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE value of the Nomad's Flagship. Return this card to the Nomad player at the end of this combat.

flagship.name: Memoria I
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 8(x3). You may treat this unit as if it were adjacent to systems that contain one or more of your mechs.

flagship.name: Memoria II (GBY)
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 2, Capacity 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 5(x3). You may treat this unit as if it were adjacent to systems that contain one or more of your mechs.

mech.name: Quantum Manipulator
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. While this unit is in a space area during combat, you may use its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability to cancel a hit that is produced against your ships in this system.

starting_fleet.name: Nomad Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Flagship, 1 Carrier, 1 Destroyer, 3 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Unrelenting
abilities.description: Apply +1 to the resukt of each of your unit's combat rolls.

faction_techs.name: Valkyrie Particle Weave (RR)
faction_techs.description: After making combat rolls during a round of ground combat, if your opponent produced 1 or more hits, you produce 1 additional hit

faction_techs.name: Exotrireme I
faction_techs.description: Cost 4, Combat 5, Move 1, Capacity 1. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 4(x2).

faction_techs.name: Exotrireme II (BBY)
faction_techs.description: Cost 4, Combat 5, Move 2, Capacity 1. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 4(x2). This unit cannot be destroyed by 'Direct Hit' action cards. After a round of space combat, you may ddestroy this unit to destroy up to 2 ships in this system.

agents.name: T'ro
agents.description: At the end of a player's tactical action: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that player may place 2 infantry from their reinforcements on a planet they control in the active system.

commanders.name: G'hom Sek'kus
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Control 5 planets in non-home systems. During the 'Commit Ground Forces' step: You can commit up to 1 ground force from each planet in the active system and each planet in adjacent systems that do not contain 1 of your command tokens.

heroes.name: Sh'val, Harbinger
heroes.description: TEKKLAR CONDITIONING. After you move ships into the active system: You may skip directly to the 'Commit Ground Forces' step. If you do, after you commit ground forces to land on planets, purge this card and return each of your ships in the active system to your reinforcements.

promissory.name: Tekklar Legion
promissory.description: At the start of an invasion combat: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat. If your opponent is the N'orr player, apply -1 to the result of each of their unit's combat rolls during this combat. The, return this card to the N'orr player.

flagship.name: C'Morran N'orr
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 6(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. Apply +1 to the result of each of your other ship's combat rolls in this system.

mech.name: Valkyrie Exoskeleton
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. Afer this unit uses its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability during Ground Combat, it produces 1 hit against your opponent's ground forces on this planet.

starting_fleet.name: Sardakk Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Cruiser, 5 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Terragenesis
abilities.description: After you explore a planet that does not have a sleeper token, you may place or move 1 sleeper token onto that planet.

abilities.name: Awaken
abilities.description: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your sleeper tokens, you may replace each of those tokens with 1 PDS from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Coalescence
abilities.description: If your flagship or your AWAKEN ability places your units into the same space area or onto the same planet as another player's units, your units must participate in combat during 'Space Combat' or 'Ground Combat' steps.

faction_techs.name: Saturn Engine I
faction_techs.description: Cost 2, Combat 7, Move 2, Capacity 1.

faction_techs.name: Saturn Engine II (GYR)
faction_techs.description: Cost 2, Combat 6, Move 3, Capacity 2. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

faction_techs.name: Hel-Titan I
faction_techs.description: Combat 7. PLANETARY SHIELD, SPACE CANNON 6, SUSTAIN DAMAGE, PRODUCTION 1. This unit is treated as both a structure and a ground force. It cannot be transported.

faction_techs.name: Hel-Titan II (YR)
faction_techs.description: Combat 6. PLANETARY SHIELD, SPACE CANNON 5, SUSTAIN DAMAGE, PRODUCTION 1. This unit is treated as both a structure and a ground force. It cannot be transported. You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are adjaent to this unit's system.

agents.name: Tellurian
agents.description: Whena hit is produced against a unit: You may exhaust this card to cancel that hit.

commanders.name: Tungstantus
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 5 structures on the game board. When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION: You may gain 1 trade good.

heroes.name: Ul the Progenitor
heroes.description: GEOFORM. ACTION: Ready Elysium and attach this card to it. Its resource and influence values are each increased by 3, and it gains the SPACE CANNON 5 (x3) ability as if it were a unit.

promissory.name: Terraform
promissory.description: ACTION: Attach this card to a non-home planet you control other than Mecatol Rex. Its resource and influence values are each increased by 1 and it is treated as having all 3 planet traits (Culutral, Hazardous, and Industrial).

flagship.name: Ouranos
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. DEPLOY: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your PDS, you may replace 1 of those PDS with this unit.

mech.name: Hecatoncheires
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. When you would place a PDS on a planet, you may place 1 mech and 1 infantry on that planet instead.

starting_fleet.name: Titans Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 2 Cruisers, 2 Fighters, 3 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Fragile
abilities.description: Apply -1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls.

abilities.name: Brilliant
abilities.description: When you spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the 'Technology' strategy card, you may resolve the primary ability instead.

abilities.name: Analytical
abilities.description: When you research a technology that is not a unit upgrade technology, you may ignore 1 prerequisite.

faction_techs.name: E-Res Siphons (YY)
faction_techs.description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, gain 4 trade goods.

faction_techs.name: Spatial Conduit Cylinder (BB)
faction_techs.description: You may exhaust this card after you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your units; that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain 1 or more of your units during this activation.

agents.name: Doctor Sucaban
agents.description: When a player spends resources to research: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove any number of their infantry from the game board. for each unit removed, reduce the resources spent by 1.

commanders.name: Ta Zernm
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Own 8 technologies. After you roll dice for a unit ability: You may reroll any of those dice.

heroes.name: Rin, The Master's Legacy
heroes.description: GENETIC MEMORY. ACTION: For each non-unit upgrade technology you own, you may replace that technology with any technology of the same color from the deck. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Research Agreement
promissory.description: After the Jol-Nar player researches a technology that is not a faction technology: Gain that technology. Then, return this card to the Jol-Nar player.

flagship.name: J.N.S. Hylarim
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 6(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. When making a combat roll for this ship, each result of 9 or 10, before applying modifiers, produces 2 additional hits.

mech.name: Shield Paling
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. Your infantry on this planet are not affected by your FRAGILE faction ability.

starting_techs.name: Jol-Nar Starting Tech
starting_techs.description: Neural Motivator, Antimass Deflectors, Sarween Tools, Plasma Scoring

starting_fleet.name: Jol-Nar Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 2 Carriers, 1 Fighter, 2 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Capture your opponet's non-structure units that are destroyed during combat.

abilities.name: Amalgamation
abilities.description: When you produce a unit, you may return 1 captured unit of that type to produce that unit without spending resources.

abilities.name: Riftmeld
abilities.description: When you research a unit upgrade technology, you may return 1 captured unit of that type to ignore all of the technology's prerequisites.

faction_techs.name: Vortex (R)
faction_techs.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to choose another player's non-structure unit in a system that is adjacent to 1 or more of your space docks. Capture 1 unit of that type from that player's reinforcements

faction_techs.name: Dimensional Tear I
faction_techs.description: PRODUCTION 5. This system is a gravity rift; your ships do not roll for this gravity rift. Place a dimensional tear token beneath this unit as a reminder. Up to 6 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

faction_techs.name: Dimensional Tear II (YY)
faction_techs.description: PRODUCTION 7. This system is a gravity rift; your ships do not roll for this gravity rift. Place a dimensional tear token beneath this unit as a reminder. Up to 12 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

agents.name: The Stillness of Stars
agents.description: After another player replenishes commodities: You may exhaust this card to convert their commodities to trade goods and capture 1 unit from their reinforcements that has a cost equal to or lower than their commodity value.

commanders.name: That Which Molds Flesh
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have units in 3 Gravity Rifts. When you produce fighter or infantry units: Up to 2 of those units do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

heroes.name: It Feeds on Carrion
heroes.description: DIMENSIONAL ANCHOR. ACTION: Each other player rolls a die for each of their non-fighter ships that are in or adjacent to a asystem that contains a dimensional tear; on a 1-3, capture that unit. If this causes a player's ground forces or fighters to be removed, also capture those units.

promissory.name: Crucible
promissory.description: After you activate a system: Your ships do not roll for gravity rifts during this movement; apply an additional +1 to the move values of your ships that would move out of or through a gravity rift instead. Then, return this card to the Vuil'raith player.

flagship.name: The Terror Between
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 5. Capture all non-structure units that are destroyed in this system, including your own.

mech.name: Reanimator
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. When your infantry on this planet are destroyed, place them on your faction sheet; those units are captured.

starting_fleet.name: Cabal Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 1 Carrier, 1 Cruiser, 3 Fighters, 3 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Blood Ties
abilities.description: You do not have to spend influence to remove the custodians token from Mecatol Rex.

abilities.name: Reclamation
abilities.description: After you resolve a tactical action during which you gained control of Mecatol Rex, you may place 1 PDS and 1 space dock from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

faction_techs.name: Lazax Gate Folding (BB)
faction_techs.description: During your tactical actions, if you do not control Mecatol Rex, treat its system as if it contains both an alpha and beta wormhole. ACTION: If you control Mecatol Rex, exhaust this card to place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

faction_techs.name: Hegemonic Trade Policy (YY)
faction_techs.description: Exhaust this card when 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION; swap the resource and influence values of 1 planet you control during that use of Production.

agents.name: Berekar Berekon
agents.description: When 1 or more of a player's units use PRODUCTION: You may exhaust this card to reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 2.

commanders.name: Rickar Rickani
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Control Mecatol Rex or enter into a combat in the Mecatol Rex system. During combat: Apply +2 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls in the Mecatol Res system, your home system, and each system that contains a legendary planet.

heroes.name: Mathis Mathinus
heroes.description: IMPERIAL SEAL. ACTION: Perform the primary ability of any strategy card. Then, choose any number of other players. Those players may perform the secondary ability of that strategy card. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Acquiescence Ω
promissory.description: When the Winnu player resolves a strategic action: You do not have to spend or place a command token to resolve the secondary ability of that strategy card. The, return this card ot the Winnu player.

flagship.name: Salai Sai Corian
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7, Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. When this unit makes a combat roll, it rolls a number of dice equal to the number of your opponent's non-fighter ships in this system.

mech.name: Reclaimer
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. After you resolve a tactical action where you gained control of this planet, you may place 1 PDS or 1 Space Dock from your reinforcements on this planet.

starting_techs.name: Winnu Starting Techs
starting_techs.description: Choose any 1 technology that has no prerequisites.

starting_fleet.name: Winnu Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 2 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Peace Accords
abilities.description: After you resolve the primary or secondary ability of the 'Diplomacy' strategy card, you may gain control of 1 planet other than Mecatol Rex that does not contain any units and is in a system that is adjacent to a planet oyu control.

abilities.name: Quash
abilities.description: When an agenda is revealed, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool to discard that agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this agenda instead.

faction_techs.name: Nullification Field (YY)
faction_techs.description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool; immediately end that player's turn.

faction_techs.name: Instinct Training (G)
faction_techs.description: You may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool when another player plays an action card; cancel that action card.

agents.name: Ggrocuto Rinn
agents.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to ready any planet; if that planet is in a system that is adjacent to a planet you control, you may remove 1 infantry form that planet and return it to its reinforcements.

commanders.name: Elder Qanoj
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Control planets that have a combined value of at least 12 influence. Each planet you exhaust to cast votes provides 1 additional vote. Game effects cannot prevent you from voting on an agenda.

heroes.name: Xxekir Grom Ω
heroes.description: POLITICLA DATA NEXUS. When you exhaust planets, combine the values of their resources and influence. Treat the combined value as if it were both resources and influence.

promissory.name: Political Favor
promissory.description: When an agenda is revealed: Remove 1 token from the Xxcha player's strategy pool and return it to thier reinforcements. Then, discard the revealed agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the dec. Players vote on this agenda instead. Then, return this card to the Xxcha player.

flagship.name: Loncara Ssodu
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, SPACE CANNON 5(x3). You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are in adjacent systems.

mech.name: Indomitus
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE, SPACE CANNON 8. You may use this unit's Space Cannon ability against ships that are in adjacent systems.

starting_fleet.name: Xxcha StartingFleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 2 Cruisers, 3 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Indoctrination
abilities.description: At the start of a ground combat, you may spend 2 influence to replace 1 of your opponent's participating infantry with 1 infantry from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Devotion
abilities.description: After each space battle round, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships in that system.

faction_techs.name: Impulse Core (YY)
faction_techs.description: At the sart of a space combat, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships; that hit must be assigned by your opponent to 1 of their non-fighter ships, if able.

faction_techs.name: Yin Spinner Ω (GG)
faction_techs.description: After you produce units, place up to 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control or in any space area that contains 1 or more of your ships.

agents.name: Brother Milor Ω
agents.description: After a player's unit is destroyed: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to place 2 fighters in the destroyed unit's system if it were a ship, or 2 infantry on its planet if it was a ground force.

commanders.name: Brother Omar Ω
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Use one of your faction abilities. This card satisfies a green technology prerequisite. When you research a technology owned by another player, you may return 1 of your infantry to reinforcements to ignore its prerequisites.

heroes.name: Dannel of the Tenth Ω
heroes.description: QUANTUM DISSEMINATION Ω. ACTION: Commit up to 3 infantry from your reinforcements to any non-home planets and resolve invasions on those planets; players cannot use SPACE CANNON against those units. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Greyfire Mutagen Ω
promissory.description: At the start of a ground combat against 2 or more gorund forces that are not controlled by the yin player: Replace 1 of your opponent's infantry with 1 infantry from your reinforcements. Then, return this card to the Yin player.

flagship.name: Van Hauge
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 9(x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. When this ship is destroyed, destroy all ships in this system.

mech.name: Moyin's Ashes
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. DEPLOY: When you use your INDOCTRINATION faction ability, you may spend 1 additional influence to replace your opponent's unit with 1 mech instead of 1 infantry.

starting_fleet.name: Yin Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Destroyer, 4 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Stall Tactics
abilities.description: ACTION: Discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: Scheming
abilities.description: When you draw 1 or more action cards, draw 1 additional action card. Then, choose and discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: Crafty
abilities.description: You can have any number of action cards in your hand. Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

faction_techs.name: Transparasteel Plating (G)
faction_techs.description: During your turn of the action phase, players that have passed cannot play action cards.

faction_techs.name: Mageon Implants (GGG)
faction_techs.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to look at another player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand.

agents.name: Ssruu
agents.description: This card has the text ability of each other player's agent, even if that agent is exhausted.

commanders.name: So Ata
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 7 action cards. After another player activates a system that contains your units: You may look at that player's action cards, promissory notes, or secret objectives.

heroes.name: Kyver, Blade and Key
heroes.description: GUILD OF SPIES. ACTION: Each other player shows you 1 action card from their hand. For each player, you may either take that card or force that player to discard 3 random action cards from their hand. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Spy Net
promissory.description: At the start of your turn: Look at the Yssaril player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand. Then, return this card to the Yssaril player.

flagship.name: Y'sia Y'ssrila
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 2, Capacity 3. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. This ship can move through systems that contain other player's ships.

mech.name: Blackshade Infiltrator
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. After you use your STALL TACTICS faction ability, you may place 1 mech on a planet you control.

starting_fleet.name: Yssaril Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 5 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

planets.name: Primor
planets.legendary_ability: The Atrament - You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to place up to 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

planets.name: Hope's End
planets.legendary_ability: Imperial Arms Vault - You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to place 1 mech from your reinforcements on any planet you control, or draw 1 action card.
